column4: is there a way to install a .deb package through terminal? or can anyone tell me why synaptic is refusing to cooperate?
- any time somebody gives you a command that starts with man that means they are referecing you to the "man pages" ie; manual pages ie; they want you to read up on a very basic command...
- sudo apt-get update  ... see if it has any issues that need to be fixed.
